Hi, has anyone got Syntax highlighting and autocompletion working nicely for PHPStorm? The only thing I've got working is this live template file for autocompletion... but for highlighting and other features says:

<https://github.com/SylvainTirreau/HubSpot-cms-JetBrains>

1) to create my own Syntax highlighting - but since I am new to HubL I'm not sure how I should configure it - suerly there is a config file somewhere out there I can use?
2) to activate Jinja - but I don't see any such options and I assume that's because Jinja is in Python?

Alternatively, is there a more suitabe IDE from JetBrains I should use? I've been using JetBrains for 6 years now and really not keen to make a switch I'm just 100% comfortable with it and have several of my own customisations and workflows I've built up over time using PHPStorm. The main issue is I've started a new job which is a HubSpot specialist company so I will be working with HubSpot full time, so it's important that I get this setup nicely.
